name: ABS-CBNNewsFlash
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Follow the latest and breaking news on the Philippines and the world from ABS-CBN News within Alexa’s Flash Briefing. Some content may be in Filipino.

After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing.

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move ABS-CBN News to the top of your news brief.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
